member.name: VARKIND.VAR_PERINSTANCE
member.summary: The variable is a field or member of the type. It exists at a fixed offset within each instance of the type.

member.name: VARKIND.VAR_STATIC
member.summary: There is only one instance of the variable.

member.name: VARKIND.VAR_CONST
member.summary: The VARDESC describes a symbolic constant. There is no memory associated with it.

member.name: VARKIND.VAR_DISPATCH
member.summary: The variable can only be accessed through IDispatch.Invoke.
